ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then We make grain grow in it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then caused the grain to grow out of it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We cause therein Habb to grow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We cause to grow therein the grain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and therein made the grains to grow
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And cause the grain to grow therein
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We make the grain grow out of it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We cause therein the grain to grow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and make the grain grow in it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We cause therein the grain to grow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: how We made the grain to grow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And caused to grow within it grain
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:27] and cause the grains, such as wheat and barley, to grow therein,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And cause the grain) all kinds of grain (to grow therein) in the earth
